name: The prize is a LIE!
description:
The prize is a LIE! The game show video game Welcome to tonight's show!

The prize is a LIE! takes place in a abandoned stage run by the all powerful game developer. You as a rogue ContestantBot must escape the studio by defying the developer/gameshow host. 

Controls: 

  • W, A, S, D - To move
  • E - to pick up / Interact
  • Left Mouse - to throw objects
  • Spacebar - To jump

Developed by Derich Havenga and Jan-Hendrik Brink
